post:
**[KMS-Hosting.com](https://www.kms-hosting.com)** offers hosting solutions from Shared Webhosting to Dedicated Servers since 2012. We operate our own hardware and Juniper based 10/40Gbit network (AS30823) within two datacenters in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

Our physical kvm nodes are based on HP Enterprise servers with Intel Xeon E5 CPUs, Hardware Raid, ECC Ram and 10Gbit Uplink each. Every server comes with our award winning Inhouse DDoS-Protection which is based on years of research and development, mitigating even complex attacks up on layer7 like http floods.

**Our features:**  
-KVM bare metal virtualization  
-Dedicated CPU and RAM  
-Fast SSD Raid 10 Storage  
-DDoS-Protection included  
-Out of band VNC access  
-Own ISO Images possible  
-Automated Reinstallation  
-Performant 10Gbit connectivity  
-Server-Hardware from HP Enterprise  
-Prepaid - No long term contracts  
-BGP Sessions possible  

**Network details:**  
ASN: AS30823  
Looking Glass / Speedtest: [https://lg.combahton.net/](https://lg.combahton.net/)  
Smokeping Latency Monitoring: [https://smokeping.combahton.net](https://smokeping.combahton.net)  

Current Special KVM SSD special offers:

**Root 1G-SSD - 5,60€ per month**   
-Intel Xeon E5-2690v2 CPU Core  
-1GB ECC Ram  
-30GB Raid10 SSD Storage  
-10Gbit Uplink Shared  
-Daily Snapshot Backups  
-Traffic Fair use - unlimited  

Order via [https://my.combahton.net/basket/add/2031](https://my.combahton.net/basket/add/2031) - Limited availability!

More details and offers are available on our webpage, see [https://www.kms-hosting.com/rootserver?t=ssd](https://www.kms-hosting.com/rootserver?t=ssd).

In case of open questions, just send us a mail to support@kms-hosting.com or contact us directly on lowendtalk. Thanks! :-)
